Scripts.OnHyperlinkEnter: if link then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, 'ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT') GameTooltip:SetHyperlink(link) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.link then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, 'ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT') GameTooltip:SetHyperlink(self.link) GameTooltip:Show() end
if self.link then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, 'ANCHOR_LEFT') GameTooltip:SetHyperlink(self.link) GameTooltip:Show() end
